/opt/apps/intel/13/composer_xe_2013.2.146/bin/intel64/icc   -DLINUX -D_FILE_OFFSET_BITS=64 -D__OPENMP__ -openmp -DNDEBUG -DNDEBUG2 -DHAVE_EXECINFO_H -DHAVE_GETLINE -O3    CMakeFiles/gpmetis.dir/gpmetis.c.o CMakeFiles/gpmetis.dir/cmdline_gpmetis.c.o CMakeFiles/gpmetis.dir/io.c.o CMakeFiles/gpmetis.dir/stat.c.o  -o gpmetis -rdynamic -L/home/karypis/local/lib ../libmetis/libmetis.a -lm -Wl,-rpath,/home/karypis/local/lib:
